name: axoloti-contrib
description: User contributed objects and patches for Axoloti

name: amx-util-library
description: Various useful NetLinx include files and modules

name: netlinx-common-libraries
description: Lightweight native libraries for augmenting the base functionality of the NetLinx language used for programming AMX NetLinx integrated controllers.

name: AMX
description: AMX home automation using NetLinx with generalizations for easier reuse on many projects. Configuration files allow modules to be reused without code changes. I currently use this project in two homes with only the configuration files being different. Similarly, the same TP4 GUI front-ends (iPad and iPhone with iRidium app) work in multiple locations without changes.

name: jsmn
description: A minimalistic JSON parser for NetLinx
